nodes.text: Chromium Garden was a garden located on the artificial world of Iokath, next to Selruvian biome and the Tributary. In 3630 BBY the Alliance leadership, trapped on Iokath by ARIES, passed the Chromium Garden and took shelter inside the Tributary. They later used a Colossus Droid to ward off smaller droids inside the Garden to buy themselves time to escape in a shuttle.
Chromium Garden appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne Chapter IV: Where Dreams Die and Chapter V: Ascension.
